phrases: Caramel Waffles with Apples and Nuts
Thanks for waiting!
Here are your caramel waffles with apples and nuts!
Wow!
I have always wanted to try this!
Oh, boy!
This is amazing!
Hey, where...
Huh?
Where should I start?
Hmm...
Should I take a picture?
First I was an extra... now I am a substitute, huh?
Okay!
That is all she wrote!
Is baking sweets your hobby or something?
No, no...
I do not make them.
So...good!
She is such an amazing musician, but all she looks like now is an ordinary girl.
Hey...
I thought it was just a prop, but you can really play it, huh?
That piano... is such a happy piano...
That piano's grinning from ear to ear!
It is a sad little piano, you know.
You should never put a piano near water, but they have decorated it with fresh flowers.
I learned it in piano class!
Megu-chan, that is awesome!
Oh?
That is Mozart, huh?
I learned this the other day.
But I still cannot play it well.
Is that right?
Well, it is pretty hard, huh?
Onee-chan, can you play the piano?
She sure knows how to get along with kids.
I guess her mental age is low?
No.
But...
that Onii-chan over there is an unbelievable pianist,
so why do not we ask him to teach us?
For real?
Play for us!
Show me how!
No, I... I do not play piano anymore...
Ouch!
Do not embarrass me in front of those children!
Okay... just a little, then.
Yay!
Three, two...
See, what did I tell you?
It is a happy piano, after all!
Huh?
Why are you stopping?
You cannot stop playing!
You were so cool!
Sorry... I am really... sorry...
Thank you very much!
Oh, boy, I am stuffed!
I am one satisfied girl!
Huh?
It is a kitty!
You like cats?
I used to have a black cat just like this one.
You did?
So you are not going to play the piano anymore?
You know about that.
Winner of the Moriwaki Students' Piano Competition...
The youngest winner in history of the Saiki Competition.
And so on...
Your playing style was accurate and disciplined - a human metronome.
You were a prodigy who performed with an orchestra at eight.
You have done your homework.
It is common knowledge.
There is not a musician of our generation who has not heard of you.
Since you are who we look up to.
Why did you quit playing?
Why?
I cannot hear the sound of the piano.
How cliche is that, right?
But you were just playing at that cafe, were not you?
Sure, I can hear it at first.
But... somewhere along the way...
The more I concentrate... the more I get consumed by my performance...
The sounds I play...
fade away from my reach, tangling up like flowers seized by the spring wind...
So that is why, just now...
It does not affect me at all in my daily life.
It is only the sound of my own playing that I cannot hear.
It is a punishment...
Even though I can hear the sounds of my fingers striking the keys,
and the sounds of the keys sinking...
the only thing I cannot hear is the sound of my own playing.
This has to be... a punishment.
Do not be such a baby!
Wh-What...
You are so negative!
Play even if you cannot play!
Have you tried playing with a stick between your teeth, like Beethoven?
If you cannot move your hands, then play with your feet!
That is crazy...
If you do not have enough fingers, then use your nose as well!
Mozart?
Whether you are sad, you are a mess,
or you have hit rock bottom, you still have to play!
That is how people like us survive.
People like us...
Yeah, maybe that is true for you.
Since you are in love with her, she sparkles in your eyes.
When I am with you, what Watari said kind of makes sense to me.
You are in love with food,
you are in love with the violin, you are in love with music.
I guess that is why you sparkle?
What do you call this kind of feeling again?
This is probably...
This is probably what you call yearning, I bet.
I have made up my mind.
I am appointing you as my accompanist.
Whaaat?
Since I won the Audience Award, I will be playing in the second round.
My accompanist for that.
Huh?
Did you hear a word I said?
I cannot play, all right?
I cannot hear what I am playing.
Quit your whining.
My mind's made up.
Just give in to your fate like a good boy.
You exist inside spring.
You exist inside a spring that cannot be replaced.
I hereby appoint Friend A as my accompanist.
Morning, Tsubaki!
Morning!
Come back here, you!
I said I just cannot do it, all right?
Just shut up and be my accompanist!
What the heck?
Ambushing me at this hour!
For our set piece,
I decided on Saint-Saens's Introduction and Rondo Capriccioso,
so I will bring you the sheet music tomorrow.
Home Economics Room
Have Kousei play the accompaniment for your violin?
I got dumped by my accompanist from the other day...
That guy's insanely good on the piano, right?
You knew about that, Kao-chan?
Well, to anyone who plays music, he is a total celebrity.
That is why I thought I would ask him.
You do not think... he will do it?
I am totally psyched!
Did I just feel a chill?
Like I could eat that.
Huh?
Classical music?
I thought they always played pop.
Saint-Saens's Introduction and Rondo Capriccioso?
Not only that, but it is on repeat...
What the...?
Tsubaki Kaori
Accompaniment, accompaniment, accompaniment, accompaniment...
All right, open up your textbooks to page 17.
What the heck is going on today?
Huh?
I know it is you, Tsubaki!
When did she do this?
Even my wallpaper's...
Play the accompaniment!
Play the accompaniment!
Classical again?
They have been playing this same song for a week now!
I just cannot do it...
It is tomorrow, huh?
I wonder if it will be nice out?
The way he is been acting, Kousei will bail for sure.
I am going to drag him there no matter what.
But are you sure it is really okay?
To force him to accompany me?
It is fine, it is fine.
With Kousei, you have to be at least this pushy.
It is a good idea!
A good idea!
Hey, I am going to make Watari help, too.
If it is for a girl...
If it is for you, Kao-chan, no way will he say no.
I am so going to make you play the piano!
You really like Arima-kun, do not you, Tsubaki-chan?
Well...
It is not quite like that.
To me...
Kousei is...
Even though I am an only child, it is like having a high-maintenance big sister.
He is like a hopeless kid brother...
To be honest, it does not matter to me whether Kousei plays the piano or not.
The thing is, though...
If he is going to quit, I want him to quit on his own terms.
It hurts to see him like this.
Because right now, Kousei's only living his life halfway.
Ever since that day...
Ever since that day, Kousei's been trapped with nowhere to go.
Time just stops, does not it?
So I want him to play the piano...
Because I am sure something will change if he does...
Next stop,
Totsuhara University Hospital Entrance... Totsuhara University Hospital Entrance
Stop Requested
We will be making the next stop.
We will now commence judging the second round of preliminaries for the Violin Competition.
Towa Music Competition Committee Sponsor Second Annual Towa Music Competition Violin - Middle School Division
Towa Music Competition Committee Sponsor Second Annual Towa Music Competition Violin - Middle School Division
Wh-What...
Is not this the day of the prelims?
What do you think you are doing?
I came to pick you up!
Hiding out in a place like this!
I looked all over for you, so let us get going!
But I have been telling you all this time, I am not going to accompany you!
What is that?
I mean, there are people who train to specialize in that.
No way could I ever do it!
And besides, even if we headed over right now,
I could not give a performance that I could live with...
I cannot play the piano.
Once again, I am casting about for a reason.
So what are you saying?
It is not that you cannot play.
You just will not play.
I cannot hear the sound of the piano...
You are just using that as your excuse to run away.
It is like I am at the bottom of a dark sea where I cannot hear anything.
There is no one here...
So dark...
So dark...
Were not you relieved the moment you stopped being able to hear?
You found yourself an excuse.
An excuse not to ever appear onstage again.
After all, you are no Beethoven!
Help me...
I cannot hear anything!
Did his mind just go blank?
Why is not he playing?
Did he forget how to play?
Weird kid.
I have never seen this happen before.
Someone...
Arima's self-destructed!
It is over.
Lucky break!
That is one less competitor.
This is the frontrunner?
He cracked under the pressure.
Mom...
I am going to be alone again at the bottom of a dark sea.
But you have me.
I know that cannot hear the sound of your playing, and that you have not been playing.
I know everything.
But I want you.
Just like you said, we might not be able to turn in a performance that we can live with.
But we are going to play.
As long as I have a chance to play,
and there is an audience that will listen.
Kousei!
Kousei!
I am going to play with everything I have got.
So that the people who have heard me will never forget me.
So that I can live in their hearts forever.
That is my reason for existing.
I am a musician, after all!
Just like you.
So... I am asking you to do this for me.
Please be my accompanist.
Huh?
What?
Um...
A tiny bit will do...
Please give me your support.
Please support me in this moment that I am about to lose heart.
Watari was totally right.
Whether or not it is impossible...
The girl will let you know.
I will do it.
I will be your accompanist.
I am not making any guarantees, all right?
Found you!
What are you doing?
We have been looking for you!
Do not you dare run away!
Not if you call yourself a man!
If we make a run for it, we will be there in 20 minutes!
20 minutes?
I will not be able to play decently!
Hey, I have got an idea.
Let us go!
But will you be okay?
What about practice?
Have you rehearsed together?
No worries!
We will figure it out!
Because we rule!
Do not underestimate us jocks!
I can make you time to rehearse!
Wait, should not you guys be in school?
And whose bike is this?
Hey, do not sweat the small stuff!
The town that I live in... is starting to take on color...
Inside Spring
Episode 4 Set Out
Watch Again Next Week!
Two People on a Bike is Forbidden By Law
